body:
Besides having a bad hotkey for docking the tools, this looks good to me.

I think that the devtools code will still be included in our production bundle, which makes it bigger. I think we can't really fix this without webpack 2.0. It also isn't active, so it won't slow down or bloat the app, so it should be fine.
